page.title: 18ENTERTAINMENT
page.content: Stamford Shakespeare Company. Shoestring Theatre Company. The Operatic Society. The Pantomine Players. DANCES are held at the crystal rooms in All Saints Street, at the congregational hall in Broad Street, Mirlees Blackstones social club in Ryhall Road as well as the arts centre ballroom. THE CINEMA The Cinema is in the centre of town. It costs 95p for adults and children which is good for about 2\ hours entertainment. Films that children like to see are normally on in the school holidays. The ground floor has been converted into a Bingo Hall- there is Bingo three evenings a week. There is also a YMCA where young people can find various forms of entrtainment.
